body_html:
@peterjc123 , after replacing /Z7 to /ZI I got error, '/ZI and /GL is incompatible', then I appened '/GL-'. but got the following error:

Module.cpp
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\functions.h(969): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion

c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\tensoroperators.h(47): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion

c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\tensoroperators.h(56): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\expandutils.h(19): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion

c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\csrc\autograd\variable.h(471): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion

body:
@peterjc123 , after replacing /Z7 to /ZI I got error, '/ZI and /GL is incompatible', then I appened '/GL-'. but got the following error:

Module.cpp
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\functions.h(969): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\functions.h(973): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\tensoroperators.h(47): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\tensoroperators.h(53): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\tensoroperators.h(56): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\lib\tmp_install\include\aten\expandutils.h(19): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\csrc\autograd\variable.h(462): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
c:\work\test\pytorch\pytorch\torch\csrc\autograd\variable.h(471): error C2397: conversion from 'long' to 'uint32_t' requires a narrowing conversion
